notes: A policeman tries to roust Condorito from under a truck stopped in traffic, thinking he's trying to repair it. Actually he's just been run over.

126.title: "Rita, a Truck!" 8 p. in Our Army at War, no. 243
126.author: [No author]

127.heading: Trucks.
127.title: "The Vaccination Man"
127.author: by Gary Larson.
notes: Summary: In a vehicle like an ice-cream truck, he cruises the neighborhood.

128.heading: Trucks.
128.title: "Wanted, an Automobile"
128.author: King.
notes: Summary: Doc is dissatisfied with his car, because a truck backed into it, he missed a traffic whistle, he ran out of gas, he forgot to connect one of the spark plugs, etc.

129.heading: Trucks.
129.title: "The Whiskey Bandits"
129.author: by R
129.appears_in: Carson Gold ; illustrated by Hart Amos. p. 15-18 in Devil Doone Adventure Comic, no. 42 (1969?).
notes: SUMMARY: In Scotland, Devil Doone hides in a whiskey truck and apprehends hijackers.
